results.description: We hebben meerdere vacatures voor onze scholen in en om Amsterdam. Bekijk het aanbod op zaam.nl/werkenbijzaam. We hebben meer dan 20 scholen voor voortgezet onderwijs in en om Amsterdam, van praktijk-onderwijs tot gymnasium. Elke school heeft een eigen gezicht en aandachtsgebied, zoal kunst & cultuur, dans en economie. Zo halen we het beste uit onze leerlingen. Maar we willen ook het beste uit jou halen, en dus bieden we je alle ruimte en steun om je te ontwikkelen tot de onderwijsprofessional …

results.title: PhD student Mucosal Immunology in IBD
results.description: The research group Mucosal Immunology at the Tytgat Institute of Gastrointestinal and Liver research seeks to hire a motivated PhD student to support our project on innate immune regulation in Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD). Within this project both mouse models of IBD and IBD patient material will be investigated for the role of mononuclear phagocytes in healthy and inflamed conditions. Furthermore, the interaction of intestinal mononuclear phagocytes with the (fungal) microbiota will be stu…

results.title: PhD Candidate: Effects of Oxygen and Temperature on Fish Growth
results.description: The vast majority of species on earth are ectotherms or cold blooded animals, comprising 99.9% of all animal life. The rate at which ectotherms live their lives varies dramatically, with some animals completing their lifecycle in mere days, while others take decades. What is the physiological basis for this slow-fast lifestyle continuum? Temperature may hold the key. Temperature directly affects physiological rates such as growth and development. As a consequence, warm-reared animals exhibit a …

The department of Medical ethics and anthropology of science are looking for a postdoctoral researcher for an ambitious project with the aim to 1) analyze when and how integrity issues are addressed in different research practices. We do this by analyzing how issues of integrity take shape in everyday routines of doing scientific work and compare these between and within 5 different disciplines. The second aim is 2) to support the development of research practices that safeguard research integr…
results.title: Postdoctoral Researcher Good Research Practices

results.description: The Amsterdam School of Communication Research ASCoR currently has a PhD vacancy in the program group Corporate Communication on the project ‘Causes, content and consequences of the media debate on retirement age: an analysis of intergenerational conflict’, supervised by dr Martine van Selm, dr Iina Hellsten and prof. Rens Vliegenthart. The PhD project focuses on the debate on raising the retirement age in the Netherlands. The debate invokes a conflict between generations of employees and inclu…

results.description: Geef jij jongeren uitzicht op een mooie toekomst? Word docent AVO Als docent AVO (Algemeen Vormend Onderwijs) is geen dag hetzelfde.
